articles.author: Cassandra Eldred
articles.title: Video: More than 100 million Americans under heat advisory - CNN
articles.description: CNN meteorologist Elisa Raffa explains which cities across the US are most affected by the extreme heat.
articles.content: CNN meteorologist Elisa Raffa explains which cities across the US are most affected by the extreme heat.

articles.title: Astronaut Sunita Williams' Return From Space Delayed Due To Spacecraft Glitches - NDTV
articles.description: The American space agency NASA has confirmed that the return of the Indian origin astronaut Sunita Williams from the International Space Station (ISS) has been further delayed and no new date has been set for her "happy landing".
